summary.span: 为 XHTML 适配器集（包括可扩展超文本标记语言 (XHTML)、XHTML Mobile 和无线标记语言 (WML)）的目标设备提供文本编写器功能。

span.span: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the XHTML adapter set, including Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML), XHTML Mobile, and Wireless Markup Language (WML).

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XHTML 是符合 XML 标记，基于 HTML 4.1 并允许你创建网站适用于多个设备类型。XHTML is an XML-compliant markup that is based on HTML 4.1 and allows you to create Web sites suitable for multiple device types. 它合并 HTML 的易用性与 XML 的严格元素指南，以生成与大范围的格式和样式选项的标记语言并减少标记多义性。It merges HTML's ease of use with XML's strict element guidelines to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options and reduced markup tag ambiguity. 此类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件使用客户端向呈现 XHTML 内容时的格式设置功能。This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients. 呈现符合标准的三种不同的 XHTML 文档类型的标记： XHTML 基本，它支持有限的样式和格式元素;XHTML 移动配置文件，它支持内联样式表;和 WML 2.0，也不能基于 XHTML 1.1 支持级联样式表。The renders markup that meets the standards of three different XHTML doc types: XHTML Basic, which supports limited style and format elements; XHTML Mobile Profile, which supports inline style sheets; and WML 2.0, which is based on XHTML 1.1 and supports cascading style sheets. 此类主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters. 类可以呈现所有 HTML 元素、 特性和样式属性，但是，与类中，不允许这些标记元素标题大小写。The class can render all HTML elements, attributes, and style attributes, but, unlike the class, does not allow title capitalization of these markup elements. 实例化并根据目标设备的功能，初始化多个属性，如， ，和，参与呈现页面的文本编写器并将其控件。An instantiates an and depending on the capabilities of the target device, initializes a number of properties, such as , , and , that assist the text writer in rendering the page and its controls. 你的适配器可以使用多种方法以应用样式和控制格式设置：Your adapter can use a variety of methods to apply styles and control formatting: - 和， and , - 和，和 and , and - 和 。 and . > [!NOTE] > 此类派生自类，该类又派生自类，且其大部分功能由这些基类提供。This class derives from the class, which in turn derives from the class, and much of its functionality is provided by these base classes. 你可以使用此类的成员，并且它继承自任何成员类中，以创建自定义文本编写器可使用自定义的 HTML 页中或在类适配器。You can use the members of this class, and any members it inherits from the class, to create custom text writers to use in a custom XHTML page or in class adapters. 你还可以创建新的派生的类重写的标准行为类。You can also create new derived classes that override the standard behavior of the class. 设备筛选是必需的服务器控件中使用特定的适配器或文本编写器。Device filtering is required in order to use a specific adapter or text writer for a server control. 有关设备筛选的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)和[设备筛选概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)。For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) and [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本编写器是由特定的目标设备时，相应页适配器实例化，则通过页适配器和适配器用于每个页面上的控件。Text writers are instantiated by a corresponding page adapter for a specific target device, and then used by the page adapter and the adapters for each control on the page. 此类主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设备中的元素，不允许使用内联样式，但需要从链接的样式表提供的样式信息。Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet. 如果链接的样式表存储在，则 URL 会包含一个唯一，它标识要返回的样式表。If the linked style sheet is stored in the , the URL contains a unique that identifies the style sheet to return. 对于这些目标设备，移动样式呈现控件从到样式表的缓存的信息。For these target devices, the moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching. 页面适配器可以指示保存在样式表使用，或在使用之前呈现页面。A page adapter can instruct the to save the style sheet in the using , or in the using before rendering the page. 此属性主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时进行编码的参数和 URL 值的名称，并在它们之间插入等号 （=）。Both the name of the parameter and the URL value are encoded, and an equal sign (=) is inserted between them. 中的空间`name`或`value`字符串编码为加号 （+） 和等号 （=） 编码为 %三维。Spaces in the `name` or `value` strings are encoded as plus signs (+), and equal signs (=) are encoded as %3d.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前的编码为 utf-8，则声明输出为：If the current encoding is UTF-8, the declaration output would be: ``
